tip: Rinse recyclable plastics to remove food residue before placing them in the recycling bin.
Check for the recycling symbol and number on plastics to identify recyclable items.
Flatten cardboard boxes to save space in recycling bins.
Avoid recycling soiled paper, such as pizza boxes with grease stains.
Separate glass bottles and jars by color before recycling.
Rinse and clean metal cans to prevent contamination in the recycling process.
Recycle electronics at designated e-waste centers to prevent environmental harm.
Educate yourself about local recycling rules to avoid contaminating recycling bins.
Avoid placing plastic bags in recycling bins, as they can tangle sorting machinery.
Items smaller than a credit card, like bottle caps, are often not recyclable. Check local guidelines.
